titles.title: A resolution recognizing Easy Company, 2nd Battalion of the 506th Parachute Infantry Regiment of the 101st Airborne Division.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 3/27/2014--Introduced. Recognizes: (1) the impact of Easy Company and the bravery of all those who have served in the company, and (2) the Pennsylvania natives who served in Easy Company.
